TopicTitle: Save and Exit button fails to save

Articles.Content:
KSP Version: 1.1.0.21573

Operating System and version: Windows 10 22H2

CPU and GPU: AMD Ryzen 5 3600, NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1660 Ti

Expected Behavior: "Save and Exit" button to save the game progress. 

Observed Behavior: It has not functioned the last 3 times used.

Steps to Replicate: use the button again.

Fixes / Workarounds: idk.

A list of ALL mods: none.

Other Notes: The VAB had a spaz-out glitch where it threw a message about a ship not being able to launch because it was too big or something. IDK if this is related or not, but the "last save" (an autosave) always takes me back to the VAB on that ship. Also, I have noted that the date/time played displayed on the load game main screen is incorrect, for example, my most recent save file says I played the game yesterday when I most certainly did not.
